titleStmt.title: The practise of the diuell The auncient poisoned practises of the diuell, in his papistes, against the true professors of Gods holy worde, in these our latter daye. Newlie set forth by L. Ramsey.
titleStmt.author: Ramsay, Laurence.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By J. Charlewood] for Timothie Rider[, and are to be solde at the lyttle north doore of Paules Church, at the signe of the blacke Boy, by Henrie Kyrkham],

notesStmt.note: Printer and suggested publication date from STC; bookseller from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the lyttle north doore of Paules Church, at the signe of the blacke Boy
